Are tariffs good for the climate?
subhead: In France, half of all greenhouse gas emissions are generated by imports. Would reducing global trade through tariffs therefore improve the country's carbon footprint? The answer is not so straightforward.

title: 'Pretending that environmental protection is just a concern for hipsters means leaving the working-class population to their fate'
subhead: Economist Lutz Sager writes in an op-ed for Le Monde that underserved communities are the first victims of air pollution, which causes 40,000 preventable deaths each year in France.

subhead: Several of the films that premiered at the beginning of the festival invited viewers to reflect on questions of identity.

title: Mohammed VI, Islam and the Islamists
subhead: 'The Enigma of Mohammed VI' (6/6). His status as 'commander of the faithful' has given the Moroccan king a unique aura and has enabled him to push back against the ambitions of Islamists, whose political project and way of life he rejects.
byline: By Christophe Ayad and Frédéric Bobin

The twilight of Morocco's King Mohammed VI
subhead: 'The Enigma of Mohammed VI' (1/6). Twenty-six years after his 1999 coronation, the Moroccan monarch's relationship to power remains complex. As questions about his health arise, the prospect of his succession is fueling power struggles and backroom deals among the country's elite.
byline: By Christophe Ayad and Frédéric Bobin

title: Mohammed VI, the makhzen and the art of palace secrecy
subhead: 'The Enigma of Mohammed VI' (5/6). In order to maintain his power, the Moroccan monarch relies on a handful of loyal supporters, most of whom he has known for decades. However, internal rivalries betray a certain nervousness, revealing the uncertainty surrounding the future of his reign.
byline: By Christophe Ayad and Frédéric Bobin

title: In Kyiv, Oleksandr Glyadelov's images defy the bombs
subhead: For 35 years, the Ukrainian photographer has documented the history of his country. Starting September 5, the Ukrainian House in Kyiv will present a major retrospective of his work. The exhibition pays tribute to the spirit of national resistance.
